# ==== Commit Messages ====

EX: #issue_id feat: xxx
EX: #issue_id fix: xxx

# ==== Commit Messages(Template) ====
# #<issue_id> <type>: <subject>
# #1 feat: Add new feature
# #2 fix: Fix a bug
#
# ==== Global Commit Types ====
# fix: Fixed a bug in the code
# hotfix: Fixed a critical bug in the code
# feat: Added new feature
# docs: Added documentation
# style: Updated code style
# refactor(clean,improve): Cleaned up code, improved code quality
# test: Added tests
# chore: Updated build tasks, package manager configs, etc
#
# ==== Emojis ====
# ğŸ› :bug: Bug fix
# ğŸ‘ :+1: Functionality improvement
# âœ¨ :sparkles: Partial feature addition
# ğŸ¨ :art: Design change only
# ğŸ’¢ :anger: Conflict
# ğŸš§ :construction: WIP
# ğŸ“ :memo: Wording correction
# â™»ï¸ :recycle: Refactoring
# ğŸ”¥ :fire: Removal of unnecessary and unused features
# ğŸ’š :green_heart: Test and CI corrections and improvements
# ğŸ‘• :shirt: Lint error corrections and code style corrections
# ğŸš€ :rocket: Performance improvement
# ğŸ†™ :up: Update of dependent packages, etc.
# ğŸ‘® :cop: Security-related improvements
# âš™  :gear: Config change
# ğŸ“š :books: Documentation
